main event: On April 8, 1964, a civilian observer reported seeing an unidentified flying object over Homer, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as a small, bright, metallic object emitting a reddish-orange glow., The observer noted several erratic maneuvers by the object, including abrupt changes in direction and speed., The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes and was reported to local authorities., The observer was previously a U.S. Air Force pilot with extensive flying experience., An investigation by the United States Air Force was initiated as part of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a small, bright metallic object emitting a reddish-orange glow
witness description: The witness is a civilian observer who previously served in the U.S. Air Force.
